from pydantic import BaseModel, Field, validator
from typing import List, Optional, Dict, Any
from datetime import datetime
from enum import Enum

class BlockType(str, Enum):
    PARAGRAPH = "paragraph"
    HEADING_1 = "heading_1"
    HEADING_2 = "heading_2"
    HEADING_3 = "heading_3"
    BULLETED_LIST = "bulleted_list"
    NUMBERED_LIST = "numbered_list"
    TODO = "todo"
    QUOTE = "quote"
    CODE = "code"
    IMAGE = "image"
    DIVIDER = "divider"

class ContentBlock(BaseModel):
    id: str = Field(..., description="Unique identifier for the block")
    type: BlockType
    content: Dict[str, Any] = Field(default_factory=dict)
    order: int = Field(..., ge=0)
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime
    
    class Config:
        from_attributes = True

class FolderBase(BaseModel):
    name: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=100)
    color: Optional[str] = Field(default="#3b82f6", regex="^#[0-9a-fA-F]{6}$")
    icon: Optional[str] = Field(default="üìÅ", max_length=2)
    parent_id: Optional[str] = None

class FolderCreate(FolderBase):
    pass

class FolderUpdate(BaseModel):
    name: Optional[str] = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=100)
    color: Optional[str] = Field(None, regex="^#[0-9a-fA-F]{6}$")
    icon: Optional[str] = Field(None, max_length=2)
    parent_id: Optional[str] = None

class FolderResponse(FolderBase):
    id: str
    user_id: str
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime
    note_count: int = 0
    children: List['FolderResponse'] = Field(default_factory=list)
    
    class Config:
        from_attributes = True

class NoteBase(BaseModel):
    title: str = Field(..., min_length=1, max_length=200)
    folder_id: Optional[str] = None
    is_pinned: bool = False
    is_archived: bool = False
    tags: List[str] = Field(default_factory=list)

class NoteCreate(NoteBase):
    content: List[ContentBlock] = Field(default_factory=list)

class NoteUpdate(BaseModel):
    title: Optional[str] = Field(None, min_length=1, max_length=200)
    folder_id: Optional[str] = None
    is_pinned: Optional[bool] = None
    is_archived: Optional[bool] = None
    tags: Optional[List[str]] = None
    content: Optional[List[ContentBlock]] = None

class NoteResponse(NoteBase):
    id: str
    user_id: str
    slug: str
    word_count: int = 0
    created_at: datetime
    updated_at: datetime
    last_accessed: datetime
    content: List[ContentBlock] = Field(default_factory=list)
    
    class Config:
        from_attributes = True

class NoteSearchResponse(BaseModel):
    id: str
    title: str
    slug: str
    folder_id: Optional[str]
    folder_name: Optional[str]
    preview: str
    tags: List[str]
    updated_at: datetime
    word_count: int
    
    class Config:
        from_attributes = True

class NoteListResponse(BaseModel):
    notes: List[NoteResponse]
    total: int
    page: int
    per_page: int

class FolderListResponse(BaseModel):
    folders: List[FolderResponse]
    total: int

# Update forward references
FolderResponse.model_rebuild()

<action type="file" filePath="backend/services/note_service.py">
from fastapi import APIRouter, HTTPException, Query, Depends
from typing import List, Optional
from datetime import datetime
from sqlalchemy import create_engine, Column, String, DateTime, Boolean, ForeignKey, Text, Integer, JSON
from sqlalchemy.ext.declarative import declarative_base
from sqlalchemy.orm import sessionmaker, Session, relationship
from sqlalchemy.sql import func
import uuid
import json
from models.note_models import (
    NoteCreate, NoteUpdate, NoteResponse, NoteListResponse,
    FolderCreate, FolderUpdate, FolderResponse, FolderListResponse,
    NoteSearchResponse, ContentBlock, BlockType
)

# Database setup
DATABASE_URL = "sqlite:///./notes.db"
engine = create_engine(DATABASE_URL, connect_args={"check_same_thread": False})
SessionLocal = sessionmaker(autocommit=False, autoflush=False, bind=engine)
Base = declarative_base()

# Database models
class DBFolder(Base):
    __tablename__ = "folders"
    
    id = Column(String, primary_key=True, default=lambda: str(uuid.uuid4()))
    name = Column(String(100), nullable=False)
    color = Column(String(7), default="#3b82f6")
    icon = Column(String(2), default="üìÅ")
    parent_id = Column(String, ForeignKey("folders.id"), nullable=True)
    user_id = Column(String, default="default_user")  # Simplified for demo
    created_at = Column(DateTime, default=func.now())
    updated_at = Column(DateTime, default=func.now(), onupdate=func.now())
    
    parent = relationship("DBFolder", remote_side=[id])
    children = relationship("DBFolder")
    notes = relationship("DBNote", back_populates="folder")

class DBNote(Base):
    __tablename__ = "notes"
    
    id = Column(String, primary_key=True, default=lambda: str(uuid.uuid4()))
    title = Column(String(200), nullable=False)
    slug = Column(String, unique=True)
    folder_id = Column(String, ForeignKey("folders.id"), nullable=True)
    user_id = Column(String, default="default_user")  # Simplified for demo
    is_pinned = Column(Boolean, default=False)
    is_archived = Column(Boolean, default=False)
    tags = Column(Text, default="[]")
    content = Column(Text, default="[]")
    word_count = Column(Integer, default=0)
    created_at = Column(DateTime, default=func.now())
    updated_at = Column(DateTime, default=func.now(), onupdate=func.now())
    last_accessed = Column(DateTime, default=func.now())
    
    folder = relationship("DBFolder", back_populates="notes")

# Create tables
Base.metadata.create_all(bind=engine)

# Dependency
def get_db():
    db = SessionLocal()
    try:
        yield db
    finally:
        db.close()

# Router
router = APIRouter()

def generate_slug(title: str) -> str:
    import re
    slug = re.sub(r'[^\w\s-]', '', title.lower())
    slug = re.sub(r'[-\s]+', '-', slug)
    return slug.strip('-')

def calculate_word_count(content: List[ContentBlock]) -> int:
    count = 0
    for block in content:
        if block.type == BlockType.PARAGRAPH:
            text = block.content.get("text", "")
            count += len(text.split())
        elif block.type in [BlockType.HEADING_1, BlockType.HEADING_2, BlockType.HEADING_3]:
            text = block.content.get("text", "")
            count += len(text.split())
    return count

# Folder endpoints
@router.post("/folders", response_model=FolderResponse)
async def create_folder(folder: FolderCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    db_folder = DBFolder(**folder.dict())
    db.add(db_folder)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_folder)
    
    # Get note count
    note_count = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.folder_id == db_folder.id).count()
    
    response = FolderResponse(
        **db_folder.__dict__,
        note_count=note_count,
        children=[]
    )
    return response

@router.get("/folders", response_model=FolderListResponse)
async def list_folders(
    skip: int = Query(0, ge=0),
    limit: int = Query(100, ge=1, le=1000),
    db: Session = Depends(get_db)
):
    folders = db.query(DBFolder).offset(skip).limit(limit).all()
    
    # Build tree structure
    folder_map = {}
    root_folders = []
    
    for folder in folders:
        note_count = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.folder_id == folder.id).count()
        folder_data = FolderResponse(
            **folder.__dict__,
            note_count=note_count,
            children=[]
        )
        folder_map[folder.id] = folder_data
        
        if not folder.parent_id:
            root_folders.append(folder_data)
        else:
            if folder.parent_id in folder_map:
                folder_map[folder.parent_id].children.append(folder_data)
    
    return FolderListResponse(folders=root_folders, total=len(root_folders))

@router.get("/folders/{folder_id}", response_model=FolderResponse)
async def get_folder(folder_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    folder = db.query(DBFolder).filter(DBFolder.id == folder_id).first()
    if not folder:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Folder not found")
    
    note_count = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.folder_id == folder.id).count()
    
    return FolderResponse(
        **folder.__dict__,
        note_count=note_count,
        children=[]
    )

@router.put("/folders/{folder_id}", response_model=FolderResponse)
async def update_folder(
    folder_id: str,
    folder_update: FolderUpdate,
    db: Session = Depends(get_db)
):
    folder = db.query(DBFolder).filter(DBFolder.id == folder_id).first()
    if not folder:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Folder not found")
    
    update_data = folder_update.dict(exclude_unset=True)
    for field, value in update_data.items():
        setattr(folder, field, value)
    
    folder.updated_at = datetime.utcnow()
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(folder)
    
    note_count = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.folder_id == folder.id).count()
    
    return FolderResponse(
        **folder.__dict__,
        note_count=note_count,
        children=[]
    )

@router.delete("/folders/{folder_id}")
async def delete_folder(folder_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    folder = db.query(DBFolder).filter(DBFolder.id == folder_id).first()
    if not folder:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Folder not found")
    
    # Check if folder has notes
    note_count = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.folder_id == folder_id).count()
    if note_count > 0:
        raise HTTPException(
            status_code=400,
            detail="Cannot delete folder with notes. Move notes to another folder first."
        )
    
    db.delete(folder)
    db.commit()
    return {"message": "Folder deleted successfully"}

# Note endpoints
@router.post("/notes", response_model=NoteResponse)
async def create_note(note: NoteCreate, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    slug = generate_slug(note.title)
    
    # Ensure unique slug
    counter = 1
    original_slug = slug
    while db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.slug == slug).first():
        slug = f"{original_slug}-{counter}"
        counter += 1
    
    # Calculate word count
    word_count = calculate_word_count(note.content)
    
    db_note = DBNote(
        title=note.title,
        slug=slug,
        folder_id=note.folder_id,
        is_pinned=note.is_pinned,
        is_archived=note.is_archived,
        tags=json.dumps(note.tags),
        content=json.dumps([block.dict() for block in note.content]),
        word_count=word_count
    )
    
    db.add(db_note)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(db_note)
    
    # Parse content back to objects
    content_blocks = []
    for block_data in json.loads(db_note.content):
        content_blocks.append(ContentBlock(**block_data))
    
    return NoteResponse(
        **db_note.__dict__,
        tags=json.loads(db_note.tags),
        content=content_blocks
    )

@router.get("/notes", response_model=NoteListResponse)
async def list_notes(
    folder_id: Optional[str] = Query(None),
    search: Optional[str] = Query(None),
    is_pinned: Optional[bool] = Query(None),
    is_archived: Optional[bool] = Query(None),
    tags: Optional[str] = Query(None),
    page: int = Query(1, ge=1),
    per_page: int = Query(20, ge=1, le=100),
    db: Session = Depends(get_db)
):
    query = db.query(DBNote)
    
    if folder_id:
        query = query.filter(DBNote.folder_id == folder_id)
    if search:
        query = query.filter(DBNote.title.contains(search))
    if is_pinned is not None:
        query = query.filter(DBNote.is_pinned == is_pinned)
    if is_archived is not None:
        query = query.filter(DBNote.is_archived == is_archived)
    if tags:
        tag_list = tags.split(",")
        for tag in tag_list:
            query = query.filter(DBNote.tags.contains(tag))
    
    total = query.count()
    notes = query.order_by(
        DBNote.is_pinned.desc(),
        DBNote.updated_at.desc()
    ).offset((page - 1) * per_page).limit(per_page).all()
    
    note_responses = []
    for note in notes:
        content_blocks = []
        for block_data in json.loads(note.content):
            content_blocks.append(ContentBlock(**block_data))
        
        note_responses.append(NoteResponse(
            **note.__dict__,
            tags=json.loads(note.tags),
            content=content_blocks
        ))
    
    return NoteListResponse(
        notes=note_responses,
        total=total,
        page=page,
        per_page=per_page
    )

@router.get("/notes/search", response_model=List[NoteSearchResponse])
async def search_notes(
    q: str = Query(..., min_length=2),
    limit: int = Query(10, ge=1, le=50),
    db: Session = Depends(get_db)
):
    notes = db.query(DBNote).filter(
        DBNote.title.contains(q) | DBNote.content.contains(q)
    ).order_by(DBNote.updated_at.desc()).limit(limit).all()
    
    results = []
    for note in notes:
        # Get folder name if exists
        folder_name = None
        if note.folder_id:
            folder = db.query(DBFolder).filter(DBFolder.id == note.folder_id).first()
            folder_name = folder.name if folder else None
        
        # Create preview
        content_preview = ""
        for block_data in json.loads(note.content):
            if block_data.get("type") == "paragraph":
                text = block_data.get("content", {}).get("text", "")
                content_preview += text + " "
                if len(content_preview) > 150:
                    break
        
        results.append(NoteSearchResponse(
            id=note.id,
            title=note.title,
            slug=note.slug,
            folder_id=note.folder_id,
            folder_name=folder_name,
            preview=content_preview[:150] + "..." if len(content_preview) > 150 else content_preview,
            tags=json.loads(note.tags),
            updated_at=note.updated_at,
            word_count=note.word_count
        ))
    
    return results

@router.get("/notes/{note_id}", response_model=NoteResponse)
async def get_note(note_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    note = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.id == note_id).first()
    if not note:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Note not found")
    
    # Update last accessed
    note.last_accessed = datetime.utcnow()
    db.commit()
    
    # Parse content
    content_blocks = []
    for block_data in json.loads(note.content):
        content_blocks.append(ContentBlock(**block_data))
    
    return NoteResponse(
        **note.__dict__,
        tags=json.loads(note.tags),
        content=content_blocks
    )

@router.put("/notes/{note_id}", response_model=NoteResponse)
async def update_note(
    note_id: str,
    note_update: NoteUpdate,
    db: Session = Depends(get_db)
):
    note = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.id == note_id).first()
    if not note:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Note not found")
    
    update_data = note_update.dict(exclude_unset=True)
    
    # Handle content update
    if "content" in update_data:
        content = update_data.pop("content")
        note.content = json.dumps([block.dict() for block in content])
        note.word_count = calculate_word_count(content)
    
    # Handle tags update
    if "tags" in update_data:
        tags = update_data.pop("tags")
        note.tags = json.dumps(tags)
    
    # Handle title update and slug
    if "title" in update_data:
        new_title = update_data["title"]
        new_slug = generate_slug(new_title)
        
        # Ensure unique slug
        counter = 1
        original_slug = new_slug
        while db.query(DBNote).filter(
            DBNote.slug == new_slug,
            DBNote.id != note_id
        ).first():
            new_slug = f"{original_slug}-{counter}"
            counter += 1
        
        note.slug = new_slug
    
    for field, value in update_data.items():
        setattr(note, field, value)
    
    note.updated_at = datetime.utcnow()
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(note)
    
    # Parse content back to objects
    content_blocks = []
    for block_data in json.loads(note.content):
        content_blocks.append(ContentBlock(**block_data))
    
    return NoteResponse(
        **note.__dict__,
        tags=json.loads(note.tags),
        content=content_blocks
    )

@router.delete("/notes/{note_id}")
async def delete_note(note_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    note = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.id == note_id).first()
    if not note:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Note not found")
    
    db.delete(note)
    db.commit()
    return {"message": "Note deleted successfully"}

@router.post("/notes/{note_id}/duplicate", response_model=NoteResponse)
async def duplicate_note(note_id: str, db: Session = Depends(get_db)):
    original_note = db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.id == note_id).first()
    if not original_note:
        raise HTTPException(status_code=404, detail="Note not found")
    
    # Create new title and slug
    new_title = f"{original_note.title} (Copy)"
    new_slug = generate_slug(new_title)
    
    # Ensure unique slug
    counter = 1
    original_slug = new_slug
    while db.query(DBNote).filter(DBNote.slug == new_slug).first():
        new_slug = f"{original_slug}-{counter}"
        counter += 1
    
    # Create duplicate
    new_note = DBNote(
        title=new_title,
        slug=new_slug,
        folder_id=original_note.folder_id,
        is_pinned=False,
        is_archived=False,
        tags=original_note.tags,
        content=original_note.content,
        word_count=original_note.word_count
    )
    
    db.add(new_note)
    db.commit()
    db.refresh(new_note)
    
    # Parse content
    content_blocks = []
    for block_data in json.loads(new_note.content):
        content_blocks.append(ContentBlock(**block_data))
    
    return NoteResponse(
        **new_note.__dict__,
        tags=json.loads(new_note.tags),
        content=content_blocks
    )
</action>

import { API_BASE } from '@/config/api';
import {
  NoteCreate,
  NoteResponse,
  NoteUpdate,
  NoteListResponse,
  NoteSearchResponse,
  FolderCreate,
  FolderResponse,
  FolderListResponse,
  FolderUpdate,
  ApiError,
  CreateNoteData,
  CreateFolderData,
  UpdateNoteData
} from '@/types/note';

class ApiError extends Error {
  constructor(
    message: string,
    public statusCode: number,
    public response?: any
  ) {
    super(message);
    this.name = 'ApiError';
  }
}

class ApiClient {
  private async request<T>(
    endpoint: string,
    options: RequestInit = {}
  ): Promise<T> {
    const url = `${API_BASE}${endpoint}`;
    
    const config: RequestInit = {
      headers: {
        'Content-Type': 'application/json',
        ...options.headers,
      },
      ...options,
    };

    try {
      const response = await fetch(url, config);
      
      if (!response.ok) {
        const errorData = await response.json().catch(() => ({}));
        throw new ApiError(
          errorData.detail || `HTTP error! status: ${response.status}`,
          response.status,
          errorData
        );
      }

      const data = await response.json();
      return data;
    } catch (error) {
      if (error instanceof ApiError) {
        throw error;
      }
      throw new ApiError(
        error instanceof Error ? error.message : 'Network error',
        0
      );
    }
  }

  // Notes API
  async createNote(data: CreateNoteData): Promise<NoteResponse> {
    const noteData: NoteCreate = {
      title: data.title,
      folder_id: data.folder_id || null,
      is_pinned: false,
      is_archived: false,
      tags: [],
      content: data.content || []
    };
    
    return this.request<NoteResponse>('/notes', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: JSON.stringify(noteData),
    });
  }

  async getNotes(params?: {
    folder_id?: string;
    search?: string;
    is_pinned?: boolean;
    is_archived?: boolean;
    tags?: string[];
    page?: number;
    per_page?: number;
  }): Promise<NoteListResponse> {
    const query = new URLSearchParams();
    
    if (params) {
      Object.entries(params).forEach(([key, value]) => {
        if (value !== undefined && value !== null) {
          if (Array.isArray(value)) {
            query.append(key, value.join(','));
          } else {
            query.append(key, String(value));
          }
        }
      });
    }

    const endpoint = `/notes${query.toString() ? `?${query.toString()}` : ''}`;
    return this.request<NoteListResponse>(endpoint);
  }

  async getNote(id: string): Promise<NoteResponse> {
    return this.request<NoteResponse>(`/notes/${id}`);
  }

  async updateNote(id: string, data: UpdateNoteData): Promise<NoteResponse> {
    const updateData: NoteUpdate = {
      ...data,
      folder_id: data.folder_id === undefined ? undefined : data.folder_id
    };
    
    return this.request<NoteResponse>(`/notes/${id}`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      body: JSON.stringify(updateData),
    });
  }

  async deleteNote(id: string): Promise<void> {
    await this.request(`/notes/${id}`, {
      method: 'DELETE',
    });
  }

  async duplicateNote(id: string): Promise<NoteResponse> {
    return this.request<NoteResponse>(`/notes/${id}/duplicate`, {
      method: 'POST',
    });
  }

  async searchNotes(query: string, limit: number = 10): Promise<NoteSearchResponse[]> {
    return this.request<NoteSearchResponse[]>(`/notes/search?q=${encodeURIComponent(query)}&limit=${limit}`);
  }

  // Folders API
  async createFolder(data: CreateFolderData): Promise<FolderResponse> {
    const folderData: FolderCreate = {
      name: data.name,
      color: data.color || '#3b82f6',
      icon: data.icon || 'üìÅ',
      parent_id: data.parent_id || null
    };
    
    return this.request<FolderResponse>('/folders', {
      method: 'POST',
      body: JSON.stringify(folderData),
    });
  }

  async getFolders(params?: {
    skip?: number;
    limit?: number;
  }): Promise<FolderListResponse> {
    const query = new URLSearchParams();
    
    if (params) {
      Object.entries(params).forEach(([key, value]) => {
        if (value !== undefined) {
          query.append(key, String(value));
        }
      });
    }

    const endpoint = `/folders${query.toString() ? `?${query.toString()}` : ''}`;
    return this.request<FolderListResponse>(endpoint);
  }

  async getFolder(id: string): Promise<FolderResponse> {
    return this.request<FolderResponse>(`/folders/${id}`);
  }

  async updateFolder(id: string, data: Partial<FolderUpdate>): Promise<FolderResponse> {
    return this.request<FolderResponse>(`/folders/${id}`, {
      method: 'PUT',
      body: JSON.stringify(data),
    });
  }

  async deleteFolder(id: string): Promise<void> {
    await this.request(`/folders/${id}`, {
      method: 'DELETE',
    });
  }
}

// Create singleton instance
export const api = new ApiClient();

// Export convenience functions
export const notesApi = {
  create: api.createNote.bind(api),
  getAll: api.getNotes.bind(api),
  get: api.getNote.bind(api),
  update: api.updateNote.bind(api),
  delete: api.deleteNote.bind(api),
  duplicate: api.duplicateNote.bind(api),
  search: api.searchNotes.bind(api),
};

export const foldersApi = {
  create: api.createFolder.bind(api),
  getAll: api.getFolders.bind(api),
  get: api.getFolder.bind(api),
  update: api.updateFolder.bind(api),
  delete: api.deleteFolder.bind(api),
};

import { useState, useCallback, useEffect, useMemo } from 'react';
import { useQuery, useMutation, useQueryClient } from '@tanstack/react-query';
import {
  NoteResponse,
  FolderResponse,
  NotesState,
  CreateNoteData,
  CreateFolderData,
  UpdateNoteData,
} from '@/types/note';
import { notesApi, foldersApi } from '@/lib/api';
import { toast } from 'sonner';

// Query keys
const NOTES_KEY = 'notes';
const FOLDERS_KEY = 'folders';
const NOTE_KEY = (id: string) => ['note', id];

export function useNotes() {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();
  const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState('');
  const [selectedFolderId, setSelectedFolderId] = useState<string | null>(null);
  const [currentNoteId, setCurrentNoteId] = useState<string | null>(null);

  // Queries
  const notesQuery = useQuery({
    queryKey: [NOTES_KEY, selectedFolderId, searchQuery],
    queryFn: () => notesApi.getAll({
      folder_id: selectedFolderId || undefined,
      search: searchQuery || undefined,
      is_archived: false,
    }),
    staleTime: 5 * 60 * 1000, // 5 minutes
  });

  const foldersQuery = useQuery({
    queryKey: [FOLDERS_KEY],
    queryFn: () => foldersApi.getAll({ limit: 100 }),
    staleTime: 10 * 60 * 1000, // 10 minutes
  });

  const currentNoteQuery = useQuery({
    queryKey: currentNoteId ? NOTE_KEY(currentNoteId) : ['note', 'empty'],
    queryFn: () => currentNoteId ? notesApi.get(currentNoteId) : null,
    enabled: !!currentNoteId,
    staleTime: 2 * 60 * 1000, // 2 minutes
  });

  // Mutations
  const createNoteMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: (data: CreateNoteData) => notesApi.create(data),
    onSuccess: (newNote) => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [NOTES_KEY] });
      setCurrentNoteId(newNote.id);
      toast.success('Note created successfully');
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      toast.error('Failed to create note');
      console.error('Create note error:', error);
    },
  });

  const updateNoteMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: ({ id, data }: { id: string; data: UpdateNoteData }) =>
      notesApi.update(id, data),
    onSuccess: (updatedNote) => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [NOTES_KEY] });
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: NOTE_KEY(updatedNote.id) });
      toast.success('Note updated');
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      toast.error('Failed to update note');
      console.error('Update note error:', error);
    },
  });

  const deleteNoteMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: (id: string) => notesApi.delete(id),
    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [NOTES_KEY] });
      if (currentNoteId) {
        setCurrentNoteId(null);
      }
      toast.success('Note deleted');
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      toast.error('Failed to delete note');
      console.error('Delete note error:', error);
    },
  });

  const duplicateNoteMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: (id: string) => notesApi.duplicate(id),
    onSuccess: (duplicatedNote) => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [NOTES_KEY] });
      setCurrentNoteId(duplicatedNote.id);
      toast.success('Note duplicated');
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      toast.error('Failed to duplicate note');
      console.error('Duplicate note error:', error);
    },
  });

  const createFolderMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: (data: CreateFolderData) => foldersApi.create(data),
    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [FOLDERS_KEY] });
      toast.success('Folder created successfully');
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      toast.error('Failed to create folder');
      console.error('Create folder error:', error);
    },
  });

  const updateFolderMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: ({ id, data }: { id: string; data: Partial<CreateFolderData> }) =>
      foldersApi.update(id, data),
    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [FOLDERS_KEY] });
      toast.success('Folder updated');
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      toast.error('Failed to update folder');
      console.error('Update folder error:', error);
    },
  });

  const deleteFolderMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: (id: string) => foldersApi.delete(id),
    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [FOLDERS_KEY] });
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [NOTES_KEY] });
      toast.success('Folder deleted');
    },
    onError: (error) => {
      toast.error('Failed to delete folder');
      console.error('Delete folder error:', error);
    },
  });

  // Computed values
  const notes = useMemo(() => notesQuery.data?.notes || [], [notesQuery.data]);
  const folders = useMemo(() => foldersQuery.data?.folders || [], [foldersQuery.data]);
  const currentNote = useMemo(() => currentNoteQuery.data || null, [currentNoteQuery.data]);

  const pinnedNotes = useMemo(() => 
    notes.filter(note => note.is_pinned && !note.is_archived),
    [notes]
  );

  const recentNotes = useMemo(() => 
    notes
      .filter(note => !note.is_archived)
      .sort((a, b) => new Date(b.updated_at).getTime() - new Date(a.updated_at).getTime())
      .slice(0, 5),
    [notes]
  );

  // Actions
  const createNote = useCallback((data: CreateNoteData) => {
    return createNoteMutation.mutateAsync(data);
  }, [createNoteMutation]);

  const updateNote = useCallback((id: string, data: UpdateNoteData) => {
    return updateNoteMutation.mutateAsync({ id, data });
  }, [updateNoteMutation]);

  const deleteNote = useCallback((id: string) => {
    return deleteNoteMutation.mutateAsync(id);
  }, [deleteNoteMutation]);

  const duplicateNote = useCallback((id: string) => {
    return duplicateNoteMutation.mutateAsync(id);
  }, [duplicateNoteMutation]);

  const createFolder = useCallback((data: CreateFolderData) => {
    return createFolderMutation.mutateAsync(data);
  }, [createFolderMutation]);

  const updateFolder = useCallback((id: string, data: Partial<CreateFolderData>) => {
    return updateFolderMutation.mutateAsync({ id, data });
  }, [updateFolderMutation]);

  const deleteFolder = useCallback((id: string) => {
    return deleteFolderMutation.mutateAsync(id);
  }, [deleteFolderMutation]);

  const setCurrentNote = useCallback((id: string | null) => {
    setCurrentNoteId(id);
  }, []);

  const refreshNotes = useCallback(() => {
    queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [NOTES_KEY] });
  }, [queryClient]);

  const refreshFolders = useCallback(() => {
    queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [FOLDERS_KEY] });
  }, [queryClient]);

  // Auto-save functionality
  const autoSaveNote = useCallback(
    async (id: string, data: UpdateNoteData) => {
      if (!id) return;
      
      // Optimistic update
      queryClient.setQueryData(NOTE_KEY(id), (old: NoteResponse | undefined) => {
        if (!old) return old;
        return { ...old, ...data, updated_at: new Date().toISOString() };
      });

      // Debounced save
      await updateNote(id, data);
    },
    [updateNote, queryClient]
  );

  return {
    // State
    notes,
    folders,
    currentNote,
    searchQuery,
    selectedFolderId,
    isLoading: notesQuery.isLoading || foldersQuery.isLoading,
    isNoteLoading: currentNoteQuery.isLoading,
    error: notesQuery.error || foldersQuery.error || currentNoteQuery.error,
    
    // Computed
    pinnedNotes,
    recentNotes,
    
    // Actions
    createNote,
    updateNote,
    deleteNote,
    duplicateNote,
    createFolder,
    updateFolder,
    deleteFolder,
    setSearchQuery,
    setSelectedFolderId,
    setCurrentNote,
    refreshNotes,
    refreshFolders,
    autoSaveNote,
    
    // Mutations state
    isCreating: createNoteMutation.isPending,
    isUpdating: updateNoteMutation.isPending,
    isDeleting: deleteNoteMutation.isPending,
    isDuplicating: duplicateNoteMutation.isPending,
    isCreatingFolder: createFolderMutation.isPending,
    isUpdatingFolder: updateFolderMutation.isPending,
    isDeletingFolder: deleteFolderMutation.isPending,
  };
}

// Hook for searching notes
export function useNoteSearch() {
  const [searchResults, setSearchResults] = useState<NoteSearchResponse[]>([]);
  const [isSearching, setIsSearching] = useState(false);
  const [searchError, setSearchError] = useState<string | null>(null);

  const searchNotes = useCallback(async (query: string, limit: number = 10) => {
    if (!query.trim()) {
      setSearchResults([]);
      return;
    }

    setIsSearching(true);
    setSearchError(null);

    try {
      const results = await notesApi.search(query, limit);
      setSearchResults(results);
    } catch (error) {
      setSearchError('Failed to search notes');
      console.error('Search error:', error);
    } finally {
      setIsSearching(false);
    }
  }, []);

  return {
    searchResults,
    isSearching,
    searchError,
    searchNotes,
  };
}

// Hook for folder operations
export function useFolders() {
  const queryClient = useQueryClient();
  
  const foldersQuery = useQuery({
    queryKey: [FOLDERS_KEY],
    queryFn: () => foldersApi.getAll({ limit: 100 }),
    staleTime: 10 * 60 * 1000,
  });

  const createFolderMutation = useMutation({
    mutationFn: (data: CreateFolderData) => foldersApi.create(data),
    onSuccess: () => {
      queryClient.invalidateQueries({ queryKey: [FOLDERS_KEY] });
    },
  });

  return {
    folders: foldersQuery.data?.folders || [],
    isLoading: foldersQuery.isLoading,
    createFolder: createFolderMutation.mutateAsync,
    isCreating: createFolderMutation.isPending,
  };
}
</action>
